item.description:
Let's go watch the game Patriot's vs The Jets!!!!!!!!!!!


Let's head down to Archie's Place..........Along the River to watch a great game!

A little about them:
Archie’s Place...Along the River, is the best place for great food and entertainment! Located in Haverhill’s trendy downtown restaurant district, they serve contemporary authentic American fare in an upscale pub atmosphere. The menu is priced right and includes everything from daily chef specials, steak, seafood, burgers, pasta and pizza. Entertainment includes live music, KENO & lottery, and HD Plasma TV’s for your sports viewing pleasure. Archie's Place Along the River's restaurant menu features a savory selection of entrees, appetizers and desserts sure to please every palate in the Haverhill, MA community. So when you're looking for good family dining at affordable prices, come to Archie's Place Along the River.

Check out their menu: http://www.archiespla...
They offer daily chef's specials, steak and seafood platters, burgers and wings, pasta and pizza, soups and salads, and a kids menu. And every meal fits a family budget.

The game starts at 4:30, let's go get a bite to eat and settle in to cheer on the Patriot's. So come on out and watch a great football game, have a few laughs, meet some new people and have a great time!

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is: 978-304-2811.

Please remember that if you have not paid your dues for this year, be prepared to pay them at this event. If you need to find out if you owe money, please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer”

Snow (pretty sure we have enough) may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change. Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

We look forward to watching the game with you!
Donna & Janet
item.name: Let's go watch THE football game!
